general.description: Milspec cares about your personal safety. Your protection is our concern, and has developed the Aegis 8501 as the ultimate bulwark for your ship. Our patented technology guarantees you the highest level of protection, while making no sacrifices on energy or subsystem control. With the Aegis 8501 you are not only purchasing core systems, you are making a statement: you do not compromise on your protection. Fly safe, fly Milspec.
